languages.text: "Каждый кусочек информации и каждый шаг мы оплатили кровью мучеников. Информацию о издыхающем кабале, который боится соваться в звездные доки своих врагов и швартуется на заброшенном причале, мы выбили силой из пленных ксеносов. Информацию о портале купили, отдав половину всего украденного и добытого оружия. И захват корабля обошелся нам в несколько жизней людей, каждый из которых стоил больше, чем весь этот проклятый город".

"Every morsel of intelligence we have acquired and every step of progress we have made was paid for in blood and pain. The information about the dying Kabal that dreads entering the docks of its enemies and instead moors in an abandoned area was forced out of captive xenos. The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."
languages.original_text: "Каждый кусочек информации и каждый шаг мы оплатили кровью мучеников. Информацию о издыхающем кабале, который боится соваться в звездные доки своих врагов и швартуется на заброшенном причале, мы выбили силой из пленных ксеносов. Информацию о портале купили, отдав половину всего украденного и добытого оружия. И захват корабля обошелся нам в несколько жизней людей, каждый из которых стоил больше, чем весь этот проклятый город".

The information about the dying Kabal that dreads entering the docks of its enemies and instead moors in an abandoned area was forced out of captive xenos. The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."

The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. languages.text: “我们得到的每一丁点情报，以及我们所取得的每一步成就，都是靠鲜血与牺牲换来的。我们听说有一支濒临溃散的阴谋团，由于不敢进入在敌人的码头，于是不得不停泊在某个被遗弃的区域，这些情报是我们从俘获的异形嘴里撬出来的。关于传送门的相关知识，是我们用武器库里一半的库存换来的。为了占领那艘船，我们付出了好几条人命，每条人命都比这座该死的城市更有价值。”
languages.original_text: "Every morsel of intelligence we have acquired and every step of progress we have made was paid for in blood and pain. The information about the dying Kabal that dreads entering the docks of its enemies and instead moors in an abandoned area was forced out of captive xenos. The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."

traits.locale_text: “我们得到的每一丁点情报，以及我们所取得的每一步成就，都是靠鲜血与牺牲换来的。我们听说有一支濒临溃散的阴谋团，由于不敢进入在敌人的码头，于是不得不停泊在某个被遗弃的区域，这些情报是我们从俘获的异形嘴里撬出来的。关于传送门的相关知识，是我们用武器库里一半的库存换来的。为了占领那艘船，我们付出了好几条人命，每条人命都比这座该死的城市更有价值。”

languages.text: 「私たちが獲得した知性のかけらも、私たちが成し遂げた進歩の一歩一歩も、血と苦痛を代償に得てきたものです。敵の港に入るのを恐れ、代わりに放棄された場所に停泊するという瀕死の陰謀団の情報は、捕虜となった異種族から無理やり聞き出しました。ポータルに関しての情報は、我々がため込んでいた兵器の半分と引き換えに手に入れました。船を奪ったことで何人かが命を落としましたが、そのどれもがこの呪われた街よりも尊いものでした」
languages.original_text: "Every morsel of intelligence we have acquired and every step of progress we have made was paid for in blood and pain. The information about the dying Kabal that dreads entering the docks of its enemies and instead moors in an abandoned area was forced out of captive xenos. The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちが獲得した知性のかけらも、私たちが成し遂げた進歩の一歩一歩も、血と苦痛を代償に得てきたものです。敵の港に入るのを恐れ、代わりに放棄された場所に停泊するという瀕死の陰謀団の情報は、捕虜となった異種族から無理やり聞き出しました。ポータルに関しての情報は、我々がため込んでいた兵器の半分と引き換えに手に入れました。船を奪ったことで何人かが命を落としましたが、そのどれもがこの呪われた街よりも尊いものでした」

languages.text: «Cada pizca de información que hemos adquirido se ha ganado con sangre y dolor a cada paso. Lo que sabemos de la Kábala moribunda que teme entrar en los muelles enemigos y en su lugar utiliza una zona abandonada se lo arrancamos a un xenos cautivo. Nuestros conocimientos sobre el portal se compraron con la mitad de las armas que teníamos preparadas. Y tomar esa nave nos costó varias vidas, a pesar de que cada una de ellas valía más que toda esta maldita ciudad».
languages.original_text: "Every morsel of intelligence we have acquired and every step of progress we have made was paid for in blood and pain. The information about the dying Kabal that dreads entering the docks of its enemies and instead moors in an abandoned area was forced out of captive xenos. The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."

traits.locale_text: «Cada pizca de información que hemos adquirido se ha ganado con sangre y dolor a cada paso. Lo que sabemos de la Kábala moribunda que teme entrar en los muelles enemigos y en su lugar utiliza una zona abandonada se lo arrancamos a un xenos cautivo. languages.original_text: "Every morsel of intelligence we have acquired and every step of progress we have made was paid for in blood and pain. The information about the dying Kabal that dreads entering the docks of its enemies and instead moors in an abandoned area was forced out of captive xenos. The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."

languages.text: « Chaque bribe de renseignements, nous l'avons payée de notre sang. Chaque pas en avant, nous l'avons franchi dans la souffrance. C'est un prisonnier xénos qui nous a révélé que la Kabale sur le déclin préfère s'amarrer dans une zone abandonnée plutôt qu'au quai de ses ennemis. Pour obtenir des informations sur le portail, nous avons dû céder la moitié de notre stock d'armes. Et la capture du vaisseau nous a coûté plusieurs hommes, des hommes qui valaient chacun plus que toute cette maudite ville. »
languages.original_text: "Every morsel of intelligence we have acquired and every step of progress we have made was paid for in blood and pain. The information about the dying Kabal that dreads entering the docks of its enemies and instead moors in an abandoned area was forced out of captive xenos. The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque bribe de renseignements, nous l'avons payée de notre sang. Chaque pas en avant, nous l'avons franchi dans la souffrance. C'est un prisonnier xénos qui nous a révélé que la Kabale sur le déclin préfère s'amarrer dans une zone abandonnée plutôt qu'au quai de ses ennemis. Pour obtenir des informations sur le portail, nous avons dû céder la moitié de notre stock d'armes. Et la capture du vaisseau nous a coûté plusieurs hommes, des hommes qui valaient chacun plus que toute cette maudite ville. »

languages.text: "Jede Information und jeder Fortschritt, den wir gemacht haben, wurde mit Blut und Schmerz bezahlt. Die Information über die sterbende Kabale, die aus Angst die Docks ihrer Feinde nicht betritt und sich stattdessen in einen verlassenen Bereich zurückgezogen hat, wurde aus gefangenen Xenos herausgepresst. Das Wissen um das Portal wurde mit der Hälfte unseres angesammelten Waffenlagers bezahlt. Und das Kapern des Schiffs hat mehrere Leben gekostet, von denen jedes einzelne mehr wert war als diese ganze verdammte Stadt."
languages.original_text: "Every morsel of intelligence we have acquired and every step of progress we have made was paid for in blood and pain. The information about the dying Kabal that dreads entering the docks of its enemies and instead moors in an abandoned area was forced out of captive xenos. The knowledge of the portal was bought in exchange for one half of all the weapons we had stockpiled. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."

languages.text: "Edindiğimiz her bir bilgi zerresinin ve ilerleme sağladığımız her adımın bedeli kan ve acıyla ödendi. Düşmanlarının rıhtımına girmekten korkup terk edilmiş bir yere demirleyen ve ölmek üzere olan Kabal'ın haberi, tutsak zenolardan zorla alındı. Portal hakkındaki bilgi, depoladığımız silahların yarısına karşılık satın alındı. O gemiyi almak ise birkaç kişinin canına mal oldu ve o canların her biri, bu lanet şehrin tamamından daha değerliydi."
languages.original_text: "Every morsel of intelligence we have acquired and every step of progress we have made was paid for in blood and pain. And taking that ship cost us several lives, each of which was worth more than this whole blasted city."
